text: Istrikovo () is a rural locality (a village) in Baygildinsky Selsoviet, Nurimanovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 222 as of 2010. There are 5 streets. == Geography == It is located 23 km from Krasnaya Gorka, 7 km from Baygildino. == References == Category:Rural localities in Nurimanovsky District
title: Istrikovo
